a.introduction, a.requestPublish, a.workIntroduction, a.enterpriseRemark, a.otherRemark, a.checkReport
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
,
from excellentselection a, enumeration b, enumeration c, enumeration d where a.educationEnumId = b.enumid and a.requestTypeId = c.enumid and a.selectResultEnumId = d.enumid
and (
)
order by $orderByClause$
limit $offset$, $rows$

select
distinct
from excellentselection a, enumeration b, enumeration c, enumeration d where a.educationEnumId = b.enumid and a.requestTypeId = c.enumid and a.selectResultEnumId = d.enumid
and (
)
order by $orderByClause$
limit $offset$, $rows$

select
,
from excellentselection a, enumeration b, enumeration c, enumeration d where a.educationEnumId = b.enumid and a.requestTypeId = c.enumid and a.selectResultEnumId = d.enumid and a.id = #id:VARCHAR#
